scenes.background: Monica looks at the clock, visibly anxious.
scenes.description: Monica says, We really need to wrap this up soon. We cant afford to go over time.

options.text: Time is important, but so is making the right decision. Let's quickly summarize our points.
options.analysis: You show high empathy and social skills by acknowledging Monica's concern and suggesting a balanced summary to save time while making informed decisions.

options.text: I understand the urgency, Monica. Maybe we can speed up the discussions and focus on key points.
options.analysis: You recognize Monica's time concern and suggest a focused approach to speed up the process, showing good self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: We can't afford to rush this. Important decisions take time, even if we have to extend the meeting.
options.analysis: You emphasize the need for thorough decision-making, showing motivation to ensure quality outcomes, while acknowledging the time constraints.
